articles.title: Who will police Gaza, and how? - NPR
articles.description: Under President Trump's Gaza ceasefire plan, Arab countries and the European Union are supposed to train a new police force in the Gaza Strip. But U.S. plans have run into serious challenges.
articles.content: TEL AVIV, Israel On Oct. 30, 2023, just three weeks after the deadly Oct. 7 Hamas-led attack on Israel sparked Israel's war in Gaza, U.S. security officials stationed in Jerusalem drew up a plan for … [+8009 chars]
